actions.in_committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

actions.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries. H. Rept. 101-369.
Placed on the Private Calendar, Calendar No. 15.
Called up from the Private Calendar for consideration.
By request of Mr. Sensenbrenner the House passed over the measure without prejudice.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

actions.text: Called up from the Private Calendar for consideration.
Mr. Boucher moved to recommit to Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
On motion to recommit Agreed to without objection.

official_title: To authorize issuance of a certificate of documentation for employment in the coastwise trade of the United States for the vessel JAMAL.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to issue for a named vessel a certificate of documentation for employment in the coastwise trade of the United States.

titles.title: To authorize issuance of a certificate of documentation for employment in the coastwise trade of the United States for the vessel JAMAL.
